Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
You have just learned the basic skills to manage contens in OpenCms. Of course, there is a lot more to discover. OpenCms is a full featured websites CMS that allows creation of the most demanding websites. 

There are a lot more functions to discover. To get an impression about what is available in OpenCms, just click in the menu icon on the toolbar and select "Show workplace". This will bring up the OpenCms Workplace, our "power user" interface. There you can see the internal file structure of the pages that have been created, modify permissions and maintain other system aspects.
